ygData.subject: Re: Still kinda dense on specialization, sorry.
ygData.msgSnippet: You can only specialize in 1 past 50 points.  the rest will max out at 50. The frist one beyond 50 is what you are a master in.
ygData.messageBody:
You can only specialize in 1 past 50 points. the rest will max out at 50.
The frist one beyond 50 is what you are a master in.

> ----------
> From: Squires, Dean[SMTP:DeanSquires@...]
> Reply To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 10:57 AM
> To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Still kinda dense on specialization, sorry.
>
> From: "Squires, Dean" <DeanSquires@...>
>
> I believe my human Cleric character has room for 5 specializations.
> Does this mean I can take alteration, abjur, evoke..etc? If so, then
> whats the problem here? I thought I had 5 specializations in order to
> specialize in 5 particular spells... Please inform.
>
> Baelstrom
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Mr. J Daniels [SMTP:warpig@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 12:19 PM
> > To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Still kinda dense on specialization,
> > sorry.
> >
> > From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
> >
> > It is? Hrm I could of swore buffing was alteration as well. I'll have
> > to
> > re-check my lists.
> >
> > Mr. J Daniels
> >
> >
> > On Wed, 30 Jun 1999 errors-200561-243-warpig=one.net@onelist.com
> > wrote:
> >
> > > From: I.G <shadowtg1@...>
> > >
> > > healing is alteration but buffing is abjuradation.
> > >
> > > Jaxim
> > >
> > >
> > > >From: "Dan Harmon" <deharmon@...>
> > > >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > > >To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> > > >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Still kinda dense on specialization, sorry.
> > > >Date: Wed, 30 Jun 1999 09:44:09 -0400
> > > >
> > > >From: "Dan Harmon" <deharmon@...>
> > > >
> > > >I understand what it is, but have a couple questions.
> > > >
> > > >I'm a lvl 13. All my casting is at lvl65. If I understand it
> > correctly, I
> > > >can't even specialize until lvl 30, right? By that time ALL my
> > magic skill
> > > >levels will be at 150.
> > > >
> > > >So if I specialize (I believe alteration IS the healing/buffing
> > one) at lvl
> > > >30, what happens? I'm thinking that my alteration will continue to
> > go up,
> > > >but the other 3 or 4 will suddenly take a 100 level dive back to
> > lvl 50?
> > > >
> > > >I'm not bitching, I just haven't decided whether or not I want to
> > do it.
> > > >Thank god it'll take me a minimum of 2 more months before I get to
> > lvl 30 &
> > > >apparently have to worry about making that decision. :)
> > > >
